title: North Korea
desc:
Post 2301
- Unflipped Cursed Country Information
 - __Curse__: Found yourself in North Korea? Treat yourself to never being able to discard a card! We cannot allow our citizens to feel freedom, eh?
 - __Trigger__: But if someone were to give you resources for the mother country, perhaps 3 cards overtime, something might happen... Perhaps abstaining from using them for 2 turns would help...
- __Country & Effect__: You would be praised and be elected as the new supreme leader! As the new owner of North Korea, you may flip any cards that come into your territory. Take a **Phantom** Sharp Sword (1623) with you too.
_ _
- Flipped ( <:country:1120863204407521351> + 🩸 + <:magenta:1106716255966220319> + <:pink:1106716301843497030> + <:white:1107514189574045726> ) Cursed Country Information
 - __Curse__: Cellar. No discarding. No flipping. No good effects. Starve.
 - __Trigger__: Find key. (*psst, accept the next 3 card draws and wait!*)
 - __Country & Effect__: Murder 경애하는 김정은동지. Take over the game. Any card draws you take go to other country (players), unless over 4. Flip any card you want. Take 3 **Phantom** Sharp Sword (1623). Take 1 **Ethereal** Upgrade?! (1936). Go and win.
